website_summaries.verdict: Ideal bag for the gym minimalist with enough space for a change of clothes and toiletries. Comfortable straps at the perfect length.
pros: Exterior material is signature Adidas quality with a well-reinforced lining
Large-tooth zipper doesn’t snag and is easy to open
Bag can double as a sporty purse or work tote for women
cons: Smaller than other gym bags, and some people find the design is too vanilla for the Adidas brand

customer_reviews.title: Over-the-shoulder gym bag with LOTS of room!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect in every way. It really is like a clown bag. It has a small-ish footprint compared to other normal gym bags, but you can fit SO much in there, and keep it organized at the same time. I was worried before purchasing that I wouldn’t be able to fit the straps over my shoulder comfortably, but as you can see in the photo it does that easily. Lots of compartments, perfect spots for blender bottles or water, and gym shoes fit in with plenty of room for clothes and gym accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: I workout during my lunch break so I have a stuffed bag. This bag can hold a change of clothes both work out and professional clothing all hair stuff, makeup there’s also a cute labeling inside the bag that allows you to separate your things and keep organized which I love hands down a happy purchase oh I didn’t have prime and took a week to come in but other than that great.
customer_reviews.author: nallelyrangel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a soccer coach bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a sports bag for my kids events. It’s perfect, especially for the teams I coach. I can keep towels, first aid kit, extra water and anything else I need for the kids. The side pockets are nice quick access for my own drink when I’m walking up and down the soccer field. Added bonus that it has a nice water resistant outer layer for early mornings when the fields are still wet from the dew.
customer_reviews.author: samantha jo

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this bag. My surface pro 6 fits perfectly in the tablet pocket. I’m always on the go and am usually carrying those oversized sports bag for all my things. I like this one because it’s more of a purse look to it. It has two water bottle slots! Which I love! I could also fit my work shoes in here also! Love the material and everything about it!!
customer_reviews.author: alissaMarie.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag to take to work
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as a caryall/rote bag for work. It's perfect for me. It fits everything I need and WAY more. It would be a perfect gym bag or bag to take with you for a weekend maybe with a change of clothes or 2. Worth the price. Only annoyance, arm holes are little 😭
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to double as both as a gym bag and a weekender. I use a Lululemon backpack for yoga and this bag is for actual gym use. It perfectly fits my chalk (liquid and powder), resistance bands, Pioneer leather belt, water bottles, extra change of clothes and tolietries with room to spare. When I travel, I like to use this bag as well. Can hold 2-3 days worth of clothes, but a towel and tolietries. My only recommendation is to make the handles 0.5-1" bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: I teach several classes of yoga per week and this bag is perfect. Roomy with light color material on the inside allows you to quickly find what you need. Many compartments make it handy to access belongings. Roomy too enough to carry my lite weight jacket and gym shoes.. Perfect to carry a water bottle on the outside of bag...beautiful soft color. Extremly happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Namaste

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weekend or Gym Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and the amount of pockets it has. I ordered it to use for a carry-on bag for a trip to Italy and it was so perfect for travel. I've used it for smaller weekend getaways as well as trips to the gym. I love the sleek look and it's not overbranded. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag! Perfect for an overnight trip or the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much! It is very roomy, made very well and lightweight. I love using this for the gym and can fit everything I need in there! I also use this occasionally if I'm staying one night away or going to a friend's house to hang out, swim and need to change after for dinner. Looks so sleek and I get lots of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Workout Chick

customer_reviews.title: Many inside pockets for "stuff"
customer_reviews.text: I like the many pockets and zip compartments in the interior of the bag, as I like a place for my cell phone. a zippered compartment to put my coin purse, and keys. Speaking of keys, why cannot makers of gym bags incude about an 8" to 10" key fob so you can attach your key ring?? It would save a lot of time & trouble searching for keys in "what pocket did I put them in?" situation?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Daylily

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gym bag of all time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for shoes and a change of clothes, fits well in gym locker. Love the interior mesh pockets. Exterior water bottle pockets are a bonus. Shape and handles make tge bag easier to carry than a typical duffle. Double top zip works smoothly and makes it easy to close.
customer_reviews.author: CDF

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great as a gym bag, with a lot of pockets to keep things organized (including several mesh ones that can hold damp things) and enough space for a change of clothes, shoes, and a towel, without being overly bulky. It also has a cushioned pocket that fits a laptop, and has a sizable outside pocket. It has enough room and organization that it would be great as an overnight bag, or for a short work trip. Seems well made and so far has made me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gym bag and after careful consideration choose this one. However once I received all the way here (South America) through my forwarder it seems I received the wrong cheaper bag (VFA roll duffle Adidas). I can’t send it back to the US kind of annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-anne K.

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for it's size, i did not want something too big or bulky. Surprisingly, it's very roomy! fits my boxing gloves, wraps, water bottle, a pair of shoes, and my clothes with plenty of room for more items. the side pockets are perfect to slip in my phone and have easy access during a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Must get.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews didn’t let me down. Love this bag!!!! Fits all my junk including kickboxing gloves! Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much room!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product!! I was looking for something smaller and it’s actually bigger than I expected but I still love it! I can fit so much in there and it’s really durable. The feeling of the bag itself is so cool and it has so many inside pockets ! Such a great and cute bag
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Best bag to use for anything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to travel with to baseball games to hold all of the essentials that would be needed. It has so many pockets and its the perfect size for what I need it for. The only downfall is that the handles are shorter for my likings and I feel when the bag is stuffed it tends to falls off my shoulder easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Blocker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments inside.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag with a lot of compartments and lightweight. Yet it is very spacious and will fit a lot of stuff. And thanks to the compartments you will not have to rummage through your stuff to get to a specific item
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great gym bag. Although, if you plan to bring a lot of big things with you then I wouldn’t recommend this one. It’s surprised me so far because my lifting shoes, lifting belt, knee sleeves, resistant bands and every other workout accessory fits but anything other than that for example my clothes from work it’s a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesia

customer_reviews.title: Best gym bag I ever used
customer_reviews.text: Fashion forward, functional and quality made gym bag. Smooth quiet zippers that won’t snag your gear. Unstructured fabric doesn’t attract dirt so it stays looking clean!!
customer_reviews.author: PolyChromatic

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It holds all of my gym stuff and stays on my shoulder. The strap could be like an inch longer but this works. I'd give it a 10 out of 10. I've already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge, no seriously. I planned to use this daily for work. Turned it into a weekender. Took off a star for that However this is a nice bag for its size, sleek looking, nice mesh pockets inside and very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best bag ever. Exactly what I have been looking for. Easy to use from gym to store. Everything fits perfect. I could not be more pleased. Hopefully it holds up but the tag says lifetime warranty so I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Katieatm

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag for all the stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking gym bag. Good quality. It does not seem to be a big bag but it can hold a lot of things. There are many compartments for all things I have! No more digging around!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Guh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. I take this to the gym everyday. It’s got deep pockets on the sides and has enough space to comfortably fit a lot of items in it. The material is really good quality and daily removed any stains. Highly recommend this to anyone that looking for a sporty carry bag - use it for the gym, travel or even groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Annanya

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need it a bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag A lot of compartments Comfortable Light weight 2 pairs of shoes- outfits everything fit One thing that would make it better is an extra longer strap but it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, fair price.. It's exactly what I was looking for and works as expected.. Not much to say other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Evans

customer_reviews.title: No better bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag carries everything a regular gym bag carry and more!!! Has so many pockets, great to divide all smaller necessities. the 2 pockets on the side are seriously my favorite!, can fit my prework out in one and post shake in another. I seriously wish i can give it 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gym bag or over night bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected but I love it’s versatility! Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great cute bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for gym! Fits so much inside. And I love the design overall!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. It's perfect size for me and my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps are pretty short. The top of the bag is right under your arms. Might not fit with a jacket or sweatshirt on. Otherwise it is really nice. Straps could be an inch or two longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gym bag
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. It looks like a medium size bag but it holds enough stuff to make it feel like a large bag. It has many useful pockets and could be used for multiple things, I just happen to use it for my gym stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! So many pockets, and perfect size. The first bag I received on a friday had a zipper that didn't work and they shipped me a new one at no charge on Monday and got it 2 days later.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn

customer_reviews.title: So nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice bag. This could be used for the gym or in my case school and traveling with kids. Plenty of pockets and space. The back is very lightweight and very strong. I am able to carry a few heavy textbooks plus other things without a problem. Stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have been looking for the perfect work/school bag and this is it. Needed slots on side for drinks, laptop spot, and large interior
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I have bought alot of "Gym" bags and they all have been too big. I love the functionality of this bag. This will be my go to bag. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth P

customer_reviews.title: So roomy yet so compact
customer_reviews.text: This gym bag was everything that I have been searching for. It's roomy enough to fit all my essentials but looks so sleek!
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle pockets on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag! My favorite is the water bottle pockets! It’s cute, roomy and can be used for travel, the gym or an everyday tote
customer_reviews.author: Nic saint

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much that I bought two
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Lowman

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bag is super cute and light weight. It’s a perfect trip bag or gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It’s so spacious and easy to organize and access. It has a lot of pockets which I love. I use it as a gym bag and I’m able to carry a towel, extra clothes, and an extra pair of shoes plus a thing of my supplements. The side pockets can fit my blender bottle and my 40 oz hydro flask
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love. Super quality. Zips are nice and smooth. Very roomy. Waterproof and easy to clean only downfall is that it is a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It’s got a lot of compartments and can hold a lot. I like that the straps have snap buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Leana Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the gym or travel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, bigger than it looks in the picture. I like that the inside is hot pink so you can find things vs all black on black. Stylish. I bought it for the gym but its a great carryon bag or weekend bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Many zippers and extra bags to put water bottles and a zipper one the outside. Love the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Zu

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute and roomy bag. Has plenty of space for lots of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST GYM BAG EVERRRR!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a gym bag that I can take to work comfortably so I dont have to walk around with multiple bags and this bag is PERFECT! Multiple compartments inside & may I add that it is very lightweight & not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS BAG!! So happy I got it! I love all the pockets on the inside to help with organization. My new fave weekender bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I use it as an everyday tote for whatever. All the pockets are awesome also. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable :(
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke and had minor scratches less than a month of use putting in a gym locker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect workout bag! Definitely recommend. Super organized and fits in gym locker!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Carry straps are a little too short
customer_reviews.text: If the carry straps were longer it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reader in the Couv

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.text: So many compartments mice for a long weekend bag or carry on for plane. Love it
customer_reviews.author: VIRGINIA S

customer_reviews.title: Sporty & chic
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag & it has so many compartments for all items to stay organized. I use this bag for the gym and to travel and always receive compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Claudi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. So many compartments and great quality. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony & Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, no shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Tons of room and looks great. Just wish it came with a shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: Love! It’s great as a purse, gym-bag and work bag!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gym bag
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and the perfect size. Lots of pockets to keep things organized and separated. Love the pink accents on the inside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It was a number of compartments and plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED with this bag!!! Soo many compartments , super convenient
customer_reviews.author: @WhatsBiankaDoing

customer_reviews.title: Successful Buy
customer_reviews.text: I use this for the gym! Its so cute! On top of that it has lots of compartments for me to put everything including what I need for tanning after!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Like the fact it got a zipper at the top
customer_reviews.author: Big Gil

product_meta.title: adidas unisex-adult Sport to Street Tote Bag
product_meta.description: The look of a tote with the storage of a duffel, the sport2street tote just became your new favorite gym bag. jaquarded webbing with bold black and white adidas verbiage.
feature_bullets: Premium jacquarded webbing: the brand with the three stripes
Self fabric water bottle pockets with snap closure
